scripts.prebuild: bun run scripts/generate-marketplace.ts && bun run scripts/generate-search-index.ts && bun run scripts/generate-rss.ts && bun run scripts/generate-sitemap.ts && bun run scripts/generate-paper-revisions.ts
scripts.test:bdd: bun run bddgen --config=playwright.bdd.config.ts && bun run playwright test --config=playwright.bdd.config.ts
scripts.test:bdd:headed: bun run bddgen --config=playwright.bdd.config.ts && bun run playwright test --config=playwright.bdd.config.ts --headed
scripts.test:bdd:debug: bun run bddgen --config=playwright.bdd.config.ts && bun run playwright test --config=playwright.bdd.config.ts --debug
scripts.test:all: bun run test:e2e && bun run test:bdd
